parser

类 Scanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.Scanner

  • class Scanner
extends java.lang.Object
    Instance of this class will convert the input of character stream into token stream. And Parser will invoke the getNextToken method to get the next token. Note that this scanner won't convert the whole character stream as soon as it receives the expression when it's instantiated. Instead, it will recognize only one token when its getNextToken method is invoked, and remain the rest of the charactor stream in its buffer.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getNextToken

        public parser.token.Token getNextToken()
                                throws exceptions.LexicalException
        The most important method provided by Scanner. Scanner will convert the expression into token stream, and then Parser will use it to get the next token of the token stream. This method use a series of sub-procedures to reconize tokens. Each procedure can be viewed as a DFA and By adding a start state and using epsilon transitions to connect it to the start states of those DFAs. So the getNextToken method can be viewed as a NFA.
        返回:
        the next token
        抛出:
        exceptions.LexicalException - if any lexical error occurs

      • leftParenthesis

        private parser.token.Token leftParenthesis()
        DFA used to recognize left parenthesis.
        返回:
        Error token if the next token is not left parenthesis

      • rightParenthesis

        private parser.token.Token rightParenthesis()
        DFA used to recognize right parenthesis.
        返回:
        Error token if the next token is not right parenthesis

      • identifier

        private parser.token.Token identifier()
                               throws exceptions.IllegalSymbolException,
                                      exceptions.IllegalIdentifierException
        DFA used to recognize identifier.
        返回:
        the corresponding token.
        抛出:
        exceptions.IllegalSymbolException - if this scanner encounter an illegal symbol.
        exceptions.IllegalIdentifierException - if this scanner recognizes an illegal identifier.

      • bool

        private parser.token.Token bool()
        DFA used to recognize bool literal.
        返回:
        Error token if this scanner fails to recognize a bool literal

      • question

        private parser.token.Token question()
        DFA used to recognize a question mark.
        返回:
        Error token if this scanner fails to recognize a question mark

      • decimal

        private parser.token.Token decimal()
                            throws exceptions.IllegalDecimalException
        DFA used to recognize decimal literal.
        返回:
        Decimal token if this scanner succeed to recognize a decimal token
        抛出:
        exceptions.IllegalDecimalException - if this scanner fails to recognize decimal literal

      • isValid

        private boolean isValid(char ch)
        Auxiliar method used to judge whether a character is a valid character of this calculator.
        参数:
        ch - the character to be judge
        返回:
        false if the given character is invalid

      • printState

        public void printState()
        Auxiliar method mainly used to debug. It will print the buffer and lookahead.

      • getTokens

        public java.lang.String getTokens()
                           throws exceptions.LexicalException
        Auxiliar method mainly used to debug. It will convert the whole character stream into token stream.
        返回:
        the token stream
        抛出:
        exceptions.LexicalException - if any lexical exception occurs

                 throws java.lang.Exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
